website_summaries.verdict: Upgraded machine is slightly smaller than other Spinshot machines. Performance is at top of the market.
pros: Ability to operate the machine from a remote smartphone app
Lighter ball machine than previous Spinshot versions at about 45 pounds
Random horizontal and vertical oscillation modes for most realistic practice conditions
Can program different speeds, shots, and oscillations
cons: Pricey model that's still relatively new to the market, so longevity is unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love the versatility of the spinshot models of play. My wife and i practice several hours at a time. Typically, we set the machine to oscillate left to right, deep court balls with a little top spin. The bin is rated to hold 120 balls. But, we find that 90 - 100 balls is ideal to allow seemless feeding into the carousel.
customer_reviews.author: Lanier C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for about 8 months. Works great, easy to transport, battery has never run down before I was done hitting - about 2.5 hours of use, and battery still going strong. I do wish you could select an option where it would just deliver the ball to one hand, but you have to do two-line mode. There are times I would like to just work on forehands, but you have to choose two widths for it to send balls to - and so I will choose the furthest setting for the left side so I can easily run around my backhand, to hit a forehand. That is a pain. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: hawk2k8

customer_reviews.title: Best machine out there
customer_reviews.text: Best machine out there. Sturdy, heavy duty, long lasting. The majority of the machine is made of out metal, not cheap plastic. And it’s actually not that heavy. Very manageable. Outstanding customer service - I’ve received a timely responses to all of my questions. would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Dude

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Hard to review because when the machine arrived it wasn’t operable. Once turned on it got stuck in the “initializing” stage. Reached out to tech support and even sent them a video. Their solution proposal was to send me a whole new control panel and for me to install myself. At the $2k price point, this isn’t acceptable. Shipping was delayed which caused an issue by missing an event, however, I can look past shipping delays based off Covid
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great machine with remote functionality!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great and has many features that others do not have. I downloaded the app and can control the machine from the other side of the court as it uses WiFi instead of Bluetooth. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Straight Forward

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic.  Even better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had been researching and eyeballing this particular product for a few years now. I finally bit the bullet and purchased it. Loooooove it! I should have bought a couple years ago haha. Can't wait to put hundreds of hours on this bad boy!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Aviles

customer_reviews.title: A great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Once I learned how to control the ball, it is amazing! I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cbadge

customer_reviews.title: Have had this machine for over a year...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this machine for over a year and I love it. Compact, reliable and very programable. Don't use regular balls - pressure less work best. I use Micro X which tend to be a bit hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hagen

customer_reviews.title: great unit...
customer_reviews.text: Great unit.. Good battery but.. It's just for warm up... Don't expect huge spin and power. But worth the money.. Wish it had bigger wheels it drags on ground when rolling. Only 3/4 Inch clearance. balls sometimes don't feed well if they are under inflated. yes airless balls best
customer_reviews.author: md500pilot

customer_reviews.title: My charger can't work, how can I replace it? Thank you
customer_reviews.text: My charger can't work, how can I replace it? Thank you
customer_reviews.author: NEWSPRING

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Very good machine for the price. Customer support was very helpful and quick to respond
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She takes lessons with a coach and in between lessons we like to drill her for consistency
customer_reviews.text: The machine is exactly what I was looking for to train my 9 year old to be a competitive tennis player. She takes lessons with a coach and in between lessons we like to drill her for consistency. The ball machine is good for this. I have only used the machine for 2 months and so, I am still learning how to use the machine. I hope to use it for years to come; I have a 2 year old that I will be training as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Covington

customer_reviews.title: Great experience! I need to make adjustments to some ...
customer_reviews.text: Great experience! I need to make adjustments to some drills but I am impressed with the overall performance of this machine. Can imagine there is a machine to top this one.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Hi,
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, the corner of two of white cover flaps was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jong mjn

customer_reviews.title: No battery
customer_reviews.text: They sell the machine to Sweden but they don’t deliver the battery due to shipping regulation. Been looking now for 3 weeks to find one which could work. Useless!
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Einarsson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built & dependable
customer_reviews.text: Solid machine that has lots of options for drills. I look forward to moving to 4.5 with the regular drill work this can provide.
customer_reviews.author: G. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem with the first unit, but Spinshot resolved the problem with great customer service and now new unit works great
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the original unit (some connections loose due to shipping) but Spinshot was very helpful. Fast customer service, detailed outline of next steps and within a few days I had a new machine and it works GREAT. AWESOME PRODUCT, HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: dont come with battery
customer_reviews.text: needed for a gift, arrived late with no battery!! i cannot use it
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: spinshot plus
customer_reviews.text: Foldable Handle is not as sturdy as it could be-->Spinshot machine's extendable handle is must sturdy. Can be difficult to lift due to awkward molded handle positions--> It is easy for SPINSHOT.
customer_reviews.author: qinfen gu

product_meta.title: Spinshot Plus Tennis Ball Machine (Best Model for an Intermediate Player)
product_meta.description: PORTABILITY ball machine is 50CM(H), 45CM(L), 30CM(W) weighs 19kg for the AC model and 21kg for the battery version. The SPINSHOT-Plus is lighter and more compact than any other ball machine with similar features. Towing wheels included. EASY SETTINGS All settings can be quickly setup on the control panel and shown on the LCD screen. The ball speed goes from 10km/h to 120km/h. The feed rate goes from a 2 second to the 10-second interval. Height and Spin levels are in digital numbers. OSCILLATION MODES: tennis machine has five different oscillation modes as listed below. Settings are through the control panel, and offering you full versatility for your favorite workouts or drills.  RANDOM HORIZONTAL OSCILLATION;  2-LINE HORIZONTAL OSCILLATION;  VERTICAL OSCILLATION;  RANDOM HORIZONTAL AND VERTICAL OSCILLATION;  2-LINE HORIZONTAL AND VERTICAL OSCILLATION; OSCILLATION PROGRAMMABILITY The machine will allow you to program different oscillation parameters to customize your court drills. h1-h2 will be used to change the vertical oscillation, and w1-w2 will be used to change the 2-line oscillation width. The user can program the spin, speed, and shots in different oscillation modes. POWER INPUT The SPINSHOT-Plus battery can support 2-3 hours of play. BATTERY INFORMATION. A 12 Volt 12 Amp Battery is shipped in a separate box to the machine itself. Battery charger included. The customer can order a Power Module as an optional part for $129. To fit the module into the machine is super easy and it can be looked up in UM. REMOTE CONTROLLER: An Android and I-Phone based remote application are available to control the Spinshot Player Tennis Ball Machine. USER MANUAL:http://www.spinshotsports.com/UM.htmlWebpage: http://www.spinshotsports.com/Spinshot-plus.html* Video of Spinshot-Machines :https://www.youtube.com/embed/g019y-R3Qls?rel=0
feature_bullets: Only Tennis Ball Machine not Made of Plastics
Make Quick Oscillation Mode Programmable by Control Panel or Free Phone Remote App
Only Tennis Ball Machine with Patented De-Jam Design
The Tennis Ball Machine with Flexible Power Options Available
